short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for your daily crypto check!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension focused on crypto world, you will able to check the BitCoin price always updated and use the currency converter.

Always and everywhere in your browser!
